trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by certain <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 某些所擲回的例外狀況<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref>應用程式開發介面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> APIs might throw either XamlXmlWriterException or <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>XamlXmlWriterException 或<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> ，可能會擲回應用程式開發介面</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Which exception they throw depends on the API.
trans-unit.target: 它們會擲回的例外狀況取決於應用程式開發介面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref>以系統提供的訊息描述錯誤的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref>具有指定的訊息描述錯誤的類別。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
